entry.def: Something that is fireproof cannot be damaged by fire.

auth_sentence.content: The firefighters scrambled to use shiny fireproof covers as shelters from the flames.
auth_sentence.res_content: The firefighters scrambled to use shiny fireproof covers as shelters from the flames.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The firefighters scrambled to use shiny fireproof covers as shelters from the flames.
